mapper.select: SELECT c.username username, b.url url, b.`name` `name` FROM user_permission_relation a LEFT JOIN permissions b ON a.permission_id = b.id LEFT JOIN users c ON a.user_id = c.id WHERE b.type = 2 AND b.`status` = 1 AND c.`status` = 1 AND b.id IS NOT NULL AND c.id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY b.sort

SELECT d.type_name, c.NAME AS model_name, c.id AS id FROM (SELECT a.NAME AS type_name, b.* FROM device_types a LEFT JOIN device_type_model_relation b ON a.id = b.type_id) AS d LEFT JOIN device_models c ON d.model_id = c.id
